comments.raw_text:
(In reply to Alexandru Michis [:malexandru] from comment #3)
> Luca, there are still failures on test_ext_storage_idb_data_migration.js:
> https://treeherder.mozilla.org/#/jobs?repo=try&group_state=expanded&selectedJob=299542659&resultStatus=success%2Ctestfailed%2Cbusted%2Cexception%2Crunnable&revision=56005e89ee3a807791a0457f6fab7c4d47150779&searchStr=%28x
> 
> Could you please take a look?

I'm on it, I missed to notice that `extensions.data.migrateResult` was also set to expire on 78 and it wasn't yet part of the probes already extended in Bug 1630596.
I'm going to attach an additional data renewal review request and a new patch to Bug 1630596.
comments.text:
(In reply to Alexandru Michis [:malexandru] from comment #3)

>

I'm on it, I missed to notice that `extensions.data.migrateResult` was also set to expire on 78 and it wasn't yet part of the probes already extended in Bug 1630596.
I'm going to attach an additional data renewal review request and a new patch to Bug 1630596.
